SEARCH
Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem.model

Class QuestionDb

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.model.QuestionDb
public class QuestionDb extends Object
A database management system for exam questions. This class provides functionality to store, retrieve, update and filter exam questions.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    QuestionDb()
    Constructs an empty QuestionDb.
    QuestionDb(Question[] questions)
    Constructs a new QuestionDb with an initial set of questions.

  • Constructor Details

    • QuestionDb

      public QuestionDb(Question[] questions)
      Constructs a new QuestionDb with an initial set of questions. The lastId is set to the highest ID among the provided questions.
      Parameters:
      questions - An array of Question objects to initialize the database with.

    • QuestionDb

      public QuestionDb()
      Constructs an empty QuestionDb.

  • Method Details

    • add

      public void add(String title, String a, String b, String c, String d, String answer, Type type, int points)
      Adds a new question to the database with auto-generated ID.
      Parameters:
      title - The question text
      a - First answer choice
      b - Second answer choice
      c - Third answer choice
      d - Fourth answer choice
      answer - The correct answer
      type - The question type
      points - Points awarded for correct answer

    • update

      public void update(Question question)
      Updates an existing question in the database. If the question ID doesn't exist, no action is taken.
      Parameters:
      question - The updated Question object

    • get

      public Question get(int id)
      Retrieves a question by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the question to retrieve
      Returns:
      The Question object if found, null otherwise

    • remove

      public void remove(int id)
      Removes a question from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the question to remove

    • all

      public Question[] all(String title, Type multiple, Integer points)
      Retrieves questions matching the specified criteria. All filter parameters are optional - null or empty values will match all questions.
      Parameters:
      title - Filter questions containing this text in their title (case-sensitive). Null or empty string matches all titles.
      multiple - Filter questions by type. Null matches all types.
      points - Filter questions by point value. Null or -1 matches all point values.
      Returns:
      Array of Questions matching all specified criteria

    • all

      public Question[] all(String title, Type multiple)
      Retrieves questions matching the specified title and type.
      Parameters:
      title - Filter questions containing this text in their title
      multiple - Filter questions by type
      Returns:
      Array of Questions matching the criteria

    • all

      public Question[] all(String title)
      Retrieves questions matching the specified title.
      Parameters:
      title - Filter questions containing this text in their title
      Returns:
      Array of Questions matching the title

    • all

      public Question[] all()
      Retrieves all questions in the database.
      Returns:
      Array containing all Questions
